title: BRIEF-Peregrine Holdings Says Claire Coward Resigns As Group CFO
text:
BRIEF-Peregrine Holdings Says Claire Coward Resigns As Group CFO

Stock Markets 57 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 09:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Peregrine Holdings Says Claire Coward Resigns As Group CFO Oct 3 (Reuters) - Peregrine Holdings Ltd : * JSE: PGR - CHANGE TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS * PEREGRINE HOLDINGS LTD - RESIGNATION OF CLAIRE COWARD AS PEREGRINE GROUP CFO * PEREGRINE HOLDINGS LTD - ROBERT KATZ WILL ACCORDINGLY ASSUME DUAL ROLE OF PEREGRINE GROUP CEO AND CFO WITH EFFECT FROM 1 NOVEMBER 2019 * PEREGRINE HOLDINGS LTD - RESIGNATION OF CLAIRE COWARD AS PEREGRINE GROUP CFO

BRIEF-Peregrine Holdings Says Claire Coward Resigns As Group CFO
description: BRIEF-Peregrine Holdings Says Claire Coward Resigns As Group CFO
